CheckTitle: Ensure a log monitoring and alerts are set up for disabling or deletion of customer created CMKs
Description: Real-time monitoring of API calls can be achieved by directing ActionTrail Logs to Log Service and establishing corresponding query and alarms. It is recommended that a query and alarm be established for customer created KMSs which have changed state to disabled or deletion.
Risk: Data encrypted with disabled or deleted keys will no longer be accessible.

Recommendation.Text: Logon to SLS Console. Ensure the Action Trail are Enabled. Select Alerts. Ensure alert rule has been enabled for disabling or deletion of customer created CMKs.

Notes: This check aligns with CIS Alibaba Cloud Foundations Benchmark
